mapper.insert: insert into carts (spec_id, mem_id, cart_price, cart_isCare) values (#{spec_id}, #{mem_id}, #{spec_price}, #{cart_isCare});
mapper.update: update carts c set cart_price = (select salePrice from( select cart_id, (cart_price-round((cart_price / (select (sum(cart_price)) from carts where mem_id = #{cartsVO.mem_id} and cart_imp_uid is null )) * #{salePrice})) as salePrice from carts where mem_id = #{cartsVO.mem_id} and cart_imp_uid is null ) A where A.cart_id = c.cart_id), cart_imp_uid = #{cartsVO.cart_imp_uid}, cart_merchant_uid = #{cartsVO.cart_merchant_uid}, cart_date = curdate(), cart_address = #{cartsVO.cart_address}, cart_phone = #{cartsVO.cart_phone} where cart_id in (select cId from(select cart_id as cId from carts where mem_id = #{cartsVO.mem_id} and cart_imp_uid is null) B );
mapper.select: select p.product_name, m.model_name, m.model_id, count(*) from carts c, specifications s, models m, products p where c.spec_id = s.spec_id and s.model_id = m.model_id and p.product_id = m.product_id group by model_id order by 4 desc limit ${totalShow};
